Blog.post: OK, Laura......How long does it take you to pee? GEEZ! I have been waiting for you to call back for 20 minutes.

Monte, what the hell is this! Just kidding. I will post some of them as I get them. Although from the look of it is gonna take me a long ass time! Thanks for the challange. It should help me pass the time over break. By the way I am onlyhome for a week so we had better do something! Chops do you have anything planned for break. I just know I will be home for a couple of days and just wanna come back here. I plan on seeing Sarah, Monte, and Jaime. I am going to and see a couple of movies. The Passion of Christ and Hildalgo for sure. Not sure what else. Gonna attempt to kick Jaimes ass at ps2. Maybe go bowling. Mostly just hang and chill! That is what I really want to do. Just hang out and chill. I think I will do another piece of artwork while I am home. Something to shut my brain off! That's all I have for right now. I am out!

Nothing But Thoughts Thinking Wondering Wanting Dying This is all I have. Nothing but thoughts Wishing Screaming Calling And no answer. This is all I have Nothing but thoughts Why can’t you be mine? Why do you not see us? Best friends we say, Denial I think. Love is what I feel Compassion. I am the most patient person you know. Do you realize that? Can’t you see? It was supposed to be me. Instead she is there In my place As you say “I wish she was more like you” Fool. Why have a substitute When you could have the real thing. Can you be that blind? Open your eyes and see me You say I am the most important thing in your life Why do I feel like the least. You spend time with me and things are great Easy I guess this is what happens When you love your best friend I don’t want you as a friend I just want you Yet I can’t walk away Run is what I should do Fast and far My heart is racing Speeding You are in my sights I can’t breath. I have to contain myself Pretend that it is not here Hi Just friends Nothing else No biggie Just hang Things are good with us together Girlfriend is like an STD to me She just won’t go away Wants to be my friend Not a chance Friends Yuck Time to go Shut the brain off Let things run off Can’t stop Soon another year down Still dreaming Loving Thinking Wondering Wanting Dying This is all I have. Nothing but thoughts Wishing Screaming Calling And no answer. This is all I have. Nothing but thoughts Time to let go Gone

Hello! Thank-You Laura. You are so right. I know that but, I am still having a hard time. I think it is mostly because I have lost a lot of my self esteem. I also have to start over and it seems a little overwhelming. Anyway, enough about that. I feel like I am whining. How is everybody? Somebody tell me something exciting. I am bored. Laura, I hope to see you over spring break. Monte should have off work. I am gonna start to fill out financial aid so I can go back to school. I can't wait. I need my life to move on. Well, I don't have anything to say. Next time I will be more exciting. Hopefully!

So this is gonna be a "normal" post. I promise! Thanks for putting up with my last couple of posts, they were honest but kinda strange, I know. Well, this week was so busy. Today my lack of sleep has hit me hard. I am wiped out. Totally beat and I just know that I will be up until some inane hour. Which is ok since I don't have any classes tomorrow. Spring Break is right around the corner but it feels like forever away. Tonight is gonna be a relaxing night of TV and just hanging out chillin'. BTW, Sarah, I know things are hard right now but they WILL get better. I know that I can say that until I am blue in the face but, I promise you things will get better. You just have to trust that you are a strong person who can overcome any odds. You have already proven that. Look at all you have gone through already, and you are still standing. Even Muhammad Ali's knees got week from time to time but he kept standing. Believe in yourself, I do. I know you will make it to the end of all of this and look back on it and know that you were able to walk away with pride, dignity, respect, and honor. That has to mean something! Monte, damn it! Compassion comes from us, From within. It is not given or bought, Rather it is taught through humility. Unfortunately it us a hard lesson to learn for most. For those who have already acquired it, It must be held strong. For those who have yet to find it, They must strive forward. With it we can succeed in all facets of our lives. Compassion is one of the keys. By: me I know it is not the only key so don't someone go and be smart. I am out...

Hello all! Mike, Thank-You for the nice words. I am trying to be strong. Laura, I am sorry you were having such a bad day. And you are very special and do make people feel better. I am all messed up today, too. I have just been real confused lately. I can't even really pinpoint what is wrong. I feel regret, sadness, anger, vulnerability, and I feel I don't know where to go from here. It seems overwhelming. Some days I am real positive about life and finding love again. Today, I feel there will be no man I can ever trust in a relationship. Why are we all crazy? Oh well!

I am not sure how to say what I want to say without it sounding conceited. I love it here at school. I love it because most everyone on the floor comes to me with problems and they leave feeling better. That makes me feel great. It makes me feel good knowing that I made someone else feel better. I know that my friends and family have always told me that I was important but for some reason it is different here. I know that most people like me as a person but here I really feel like people like me. That I really do make a difference. People here tell me that they like me and that they are glad that I am their friend. For some reason it has actually hit me today. People really DO like me. I don't mean that to be bragging. It's more of a revelation. I would not change the experience I am getting here for anything in the world. None of this will be going to my head but, I just feel really good right now. It is nice to have people respect you for your honesty and to have the let you know that you really do make a difference. I know I keep talking in circles so I am gonna let this go now. I want to let all of you know that you mean so much to me. Jaime, Monte, and Sarah for always being there for me when I needed you. I don't know if I would be here if it wasn't for you guys. Thank you for sticking with me when I was so down that I couldn't even see the light. Thank you for not letting me leave this earth when I wanted to and for showing me the reasons to live. Angie, thank you for taking a chance on a stranger! Shane, I love you little brother. I am so proud of you and all you do!!! Chops you have an amazing soul. Our friendship is new and I look forward to watching it grow. K, gonna go now cuz I am totally insane!!! DUH....

Not sure what is up with me today. I mean I know but I don't know what triggered it. I was perfectly fine, happy even. Having fun hanging with everyone and goofing around and then everything took a sharp turn in the opposite direction. I am angry, sad, frustrated. I basically feel like shit and I am not in the mood to put up with even the slightest tone in someones "hello". I think I know what was the final trigger (cuz it was starting before this but this was the straw). I was doing my laundry, which I am very good at making sure I am down there within a few minutes of it being done so that other people don't have to wait to use the washers. Anyway, one of the girls on the floor had her friends (who got kicked out of her parents house for fucking off) using out laundry facilities. I go downstairs and my clothes have been moved from the washer to the table. WHat the fuck!!! I have lived here for a year and no ones ever taken my clothes out of the washer or the dryer. EVER!!! I mean this girl doesn't even go to the damn school much less live in my fucking dorm! And when I said something to her she responded to me like, how dare I ask her anything. That girl should be lucky I didn't kick the shit out of her when she came up to the floor later. I know that is extreme and I wouldn't have actually done that but, I am in that kinda mood. I hate when I get this way. I feel like I am out of control. I can't keep my emotions in check and everything sets me off. I ...damn-it! I feel so alone! I wish I could curl up in a ball and stay in my room for a week. Cry. Scream! It feel like breaking something. I wish I could break something! Just throw something. Get it out! Shut off my brain and stop thinking all this crap that is running through it. I just wish I could hug someone and cry until I fell asleep. I wanna go home. I don't really wanna go home but...hell I don't know. I need to stop writing on here or you guys will have real confirmation that I am crazy. I mean you already do now but, no need to give you anymore. HEHE Night all. Sorry about this and thanks for listening.

OMG as you can see by the time of my post it is 11:45 am and I am sitting in my room. No biggie, right? Wrong. I am supposed to be in class right now. SHIT I slept until now. SHIT I didn't think I was this tired. SHIT So heck if I know how my day has gone since I am apparently sleeping it away!!! Chops I would tell them that this is crap and get the paperwork now before it is all messed up and they come to youto fix it. However, I am sure that you guys work on a system to elect who does what and that is fine. But, the system has gone arey. Bonkers from the sounds of it. So I am sorry you live in the crazy house. I meant no disrespect, just as a joke. But, Tanner 13 is always waiting for you to come home!!!! MONTE start writing you goof. You said you were gonna so hhmmpphh..... I am out for now. Love and miss you guys.

so yeah, funny story. as VP of finances I handle all the money. it makes sense. we decided early on that I would also handle money for all the other events. well, our vp of programming has decided that his committee will be collecting money for the formal cause they have all the paperwork (granted the guy with the paperwork lives all of 100 feet from me. This is very annoying, cause I know this shit is gonna end up with me eventually, and i am gonna have to decipher the stuff he started. This is very annoying.
sarah - best of luck to ya with whatever comes next.

Hello people! Well, I am officially divorced. I have so many feelings swirling around in me right now. I am so happy this is all over. I want a better, happier life. I became so used to the emotional abuse that it seemed "normal". I would even stick up for Jim's horrible behavior; which I still catch myself doing once in awhile. I know I am still working on getting my whole self back. I should be jumping for joy, but there is part of me that does miss the good times. Too bad those were few. I do feel free. This will be a start to a spectacular life without all that pain. I could not have gotten here without the loving support of my friends. Laura you have been an amazing friend and very supportive. The same with you Monte. You two are so special to me. I will still probably need you to talk to and vent. Just tell me when to shut up! Anyway, "I WILL SURVIVE"! Okay, I am done being sappy and cheesy. On to my next endeavor!
School is overrated.

Well, I finally finished my two huge projects for Graphic Design 2 and Computer Graphic Arts and now I am on to the next ones. Does the madness ever end??!! Other than that things are ok here. My friend Jaime, who I talked about before, is trying to fix things with "her". I wish I could just kick him in the ass! I love him but, this subject upsets me. I know that sounds stupid on my part but when I see my best friend getting screwed (and I don't mean that literally because if that was the case I would have to be on the side lines with pom poms and a noise maker cheering him on) all I can think of is how to fix it for them and if I can't how I can be there for them. With this situation all I can do is watch and then help him pick up the pieces. And I am afraid there will be tons of pieces. Damn, I just wanna kick him in the ass ( I think I already said that). Well, it is Monday and that means that it is a day of freedom for Sarah!!! This is a good thing! I am glad that the marriage is over because it was such a bad situation to begin with and now she will have the opportunity to be happy! She deserves that! I will have to check out Kill Bill. I highly recommend that everyone see Big Fish!!! Amazing movie, great story! Right now I am looking forward to seeing The Passion of Christ. I think I will wait until break for that. Well, I am outta here for now. I plan on enjoying the night since I actually don't have to rush to do some work!
Go see Kill Bill. If you saw it already I commend you and this post doesn't apply to you. However, if you haven't seen it, go out and see it now.

Hey everyone. Chops I checked out the website and i think it is really funny. Everyone should check it out. Sarah, the big day is coming!!!!!!! What do you think about it? how you doing? Monte stop using your damn invisible ink! Angie, how is the car and the apartment? Chops, Spring break is around the corner!!!!!!!
if you are bitter person like me or just have a goofy sense of humor check out the toons section at www.illwillpress.com trust me....

Well, I made it through another week! I took my test today and I got at least a B, possibly and A. So far I am pulling an A in GCOM, a B in Art 314 and I have no grades so far in my other classes. I will have some grades in my Art 315 as of next week. That basically sums up my week and the semester so far. My brother is leaving tomorrow to go out to sea for some test run things before his ship leaves in late May-early June for 7 months. I am gonna miss him but that is what email and letters are for. Jaime and his girlfriend are trying to fix things between them. I don't know if I think it is a good idea. She is so insecure and untrusting. She can't just decide that she trusts him now that things are a mess in order to fix things. I don't know what to say to him about it. I really don't think the two of them are a good idea. And I don't think that way because I care about him. I really hate they way he seems to feel alot of the time about her. He is angry sometimes and it really bothers me. I am tired of them arguing about our friendship. It makes me feel bad. I am glad that Jaime has stuck up for the friendship because it makes me realize how important it is to him. He has made it very clear to me that he won't give up our friendship for anything. In the beginning I understood why Melissa (his girlfriend) was nervous but they have been together for a year now and enough is enough. They are on a "break" right now because she accused him of cheating on her with me. He says he cares about her but he doesn't know what to do because it is clear she has trust issues. I just wanna tell him to run real fast but as a friend all I can do is support him in his decision. Although, I do hope he decides that he deserves better. I think he needs to find someone who is as strong a person as he is and who is really ready for a relationship. I just don't think that Melissa is ready for that yet in her life. I don't fault her for that I just hope that they both do what is best for them individually. Holy cow, I should stop writting now. If Jaime does happen to read this I hope he knows I meant no disrespect. Just trying to get things off my chest. Well, I will let you guys go and I hope everyone is doing great. TTYL

HOLY COW! So like Chops said woo-hoo to the whole Maddux thing! Go Cubbies! I finally have my test tomorrow for GCOM. The one I was supposed to have on Tuesday. My teacher gave us the wrong date and all he had to say about it was that we should all be really prepared. BITE ME!! My brother is leaving on Friday to go out on a training run for his upcoming Naval cruise. He will be gone for at least a month this time and he then leaves in May-June for 7 months. Kinda sucks and I will miss him but I know he will be fine. He better write while he is gone this time. I am gonna give him tons of stamps and address labels so he can send postcards. Other than that things have been kinda slow here. Just did some work today and hung here. This weekend is gonna be pretty busy since I have a huge project due on Monday and I have to do the whole thing in InDesign. Well, I hope everyone is doing great and i look forward to hearing from you. Oh my, Sarah, only 5 or 6 more days and you will be a single woman!!!! I think I have to say I am sorry this has happened and yet I feel the need to congratulate you. Things will be cool! Ok, I am outta here for tonight! Love ya guys! P.S. Chops remember: no worries!

All of ye who care about sports will be interested in the latest news about the Cubs. All who don't care will have to deal with me for a second. The Cubs signed Greg Maddux to a 3 year 24 million dollar deal.....This gives the 37-year old Maddux the oppurtunity to win the 300th game of his career in Chicago where it all started. This also gives the edge back to the Cubs in the arms race in the NL Central... YES!!!!!! GO CUBS GO!! GO CUBS GO!! Hey Chicago whaddya say? The cubs are gonna win today!!! GOD BLESS MOMMY, DADDY, AND THE CHICAGO CUBS.... IM OUT (if i seem a little out of it, just refer back to when this is being posted.)

Hello, all! Laura, love the poems. Poetry is great. Seven days! Seven days till I am divorced! I will be very happy to be rid of the marriage and the hell that I lived. I also feel bad because I do believe in love and marriage. I hate the fact that I married the wrong man and I was so stupidly blind to his crap. I feel like I wasted so much time. I am excited, though. To have a fresh start and I can have a happy life without all the pain. I really can't wait till I get all of my shit together; like going back to school. Yeah!!! Alright, I am going to go read. Bye.

The following poems are just two of my collection. If you guys don't mind every once in awhile I would like to put them up here for all to see. These two have been published which made my day! Hope you enjoy. Flow In the booth beside me it seems just fun at the start. Then there was the relaxation time. Things felt so right, as I glowed. Happy. Slowly came the fear. So toxic and entrapping. So familiar, so normal. Suddenly, the pain. Like a flood drowning a small town. Pain that consumed and took my life. As I saw the water flow over my eyes,the air was gone. Then the anger. So destructive, so strong. Only to me. Then nothing. Simply nothing. Now I sit in the comfort. The comfort of self and surrounding. Comfort of past and present. Next - Another step toward happiness. Laura Tiffany Copyright ©2002 Laura Tiffany Breathe The smell is still in my nose. Tingling every membrane and edge of skin. Causing every memory to shift in my brain. The scent is in my clothes and on my hair. On my sheets and in my soul. It is like smooth silk on my skin. Like rich chocolate on my tongue. Like strong hands pulling on my hair,and The feel of a soft hand on my cheek. I close my eyes. I see the shimmering colors of stars. Bold but soft. It hits me with an intoxicating blow. As I inhale, it is as if you are right there. Leaning in towards me to kiss my neck. I can smell you. It is strong, harsh, soft, and sweet. As I smile in ecstasy I reach for you. I open my eyes to see you and I am, Alone Laura Rosemarie Tiffany Copyright ©2002 Laura Tiffany

Chops...what is wrong. Is someone punishing you? Do I need to come over there and kick some butt? I will, I swear I will! Not sure what was up but if you are bummed just know that I love you. Remember that whatever beats you down, pushes you around or talks to you like you are dirt, that as long as you get back up you have won. And that because of that you are now a stronger and more compassionate person. So smile silly, you are loved! Oh, you can also just call when you need to talk (anytime) 7495
I am being punished for something....

I am getting ready to head back to school but I had to say a few things first. Shane Congratulations on the house! I am so proud of and so excited for you! You deserve the best little brother and it is all coming to you! I love you! Angie, wow a new car! That is so cool. What color is it? How is the apartment doing? I cannot believe the wedding is so close. What a year it has been for you already! Congrats to you and your man on your progress in life, I love ya. Until later....

hey laura i am just wondering how you are doing.. i got a new car the other day. my old one died. i got a 2003 dodge neon. it only had 25 miles on it when i picked it up. i have never had a brand new car before. how is school?? i only have 2 months til the big day. well 2 months and 2 days. i am majorly freakin'. i have to cancel the food and figure out what to do. plus trying to move. ugh. i want to be 10 yrs old again. so much less stress. i will be praying for you about the test results love ya angela

Hey everyone. I just got home and it is late. 4:00 am to be exact. I had a great night and did some crazy stuff but overall I had fun. I got to hang out with Jaime and when I got home I got to talk to Sarah. I breifly got to talk to Monte today and it seems that everyone is coping ok with the day. I am gonna go and crash but I just wanted to say thank you to Jaime for making me feel better about eveything (you have been a lifesaver). Thanks to Sarah and Monte for helping me through things and thanks to Chops for listening to me ramble and supporting me. All of you mean alot to me and I just wanted to make sure you knew it. Off to bed now, talk to you later. Love you guys!

I don't know what the heck I am doing awake right now. it is 7:30 am on Saturday. I think I am gonna go back to bed. I just thought you should all know this! I firmly agree with Chops concerning National Single Awareness Day. Being single does have a certian freedom about it. Ii like that, sometimes and today I am gonna truly enjoy it! Back to be and until later!

Crazy... I was crazy once... they locked me up in around room and told me to sit in the corner... corner... i couldnt find the corner... that bugs me.. bugs I hate bugs.. they drive me crazy...Crazy... I was crazy once.... ive been somewhat frustrated lately, and this came to mind. National Singles Awareness Day is upon us. Celebrate it. If you are single enjoy your freedom or just go out and have a good time. Don't think about the fact that you are single. Just enjoy the moment. If you are in a relationship. Don't worry about what might happen, dont worry about what has happened. Just enjoy the moment. Now I just gotta get myself to follow that and everything will be good.

Hey guys! Things are looking up on this end. I went and got my hair done and it looks pretty much like shit. But since it looks like I am gonna live I guess it will at least grow out! and it does look like shit! So I went to m y many doctor visits today. The doctor that I have been dealing with these past weeks says that my skin cell test came back and that there was not enough tissue to test. However, she feels that I am getting better and as long as I continue to improve and heal up all the way than I should be fine. So I am gonna take all of that as good news and be thankful! No cancer for now!!!!!! I have to go back in a month and see her to have some more tests done but for now I am okie dokie! Woo hoooooooooo!!!!!!!!!! The other doctor that I had to see today says that I am still crazy and she upped my meds/ Oh well so I am a bit "out of whack" what else is new! Shocking huh! Other than that I am hibernating in my house due to my awful haircut. I have a poodle on my head. It will grow out and look fine in a few weeks so I just gotta get through the next few weeks! I think I can manage a bad cut. At least I know it won't drive me crazy since I am already there! hehe Hope all of you are doing great. I was right, I knew Sarah would fill out the survey! I hope you enjoyed your day off Chops! Later

I just got home. I had a great night hanging out with Jaime and his mom. It was relaxing and fun all at once. Just my idea of a wonderful evening. We wnt out to dinner and then hung out goofed around and watched tv. Anyway, just wanted everyone to know I had a great night. I am looking forward to hanging out with Sarah and Monte tomorrow (I think that is when we are getting together). Woo hoo! Tomorrow I have some doctors appointments and then my hair. Oh the hair...ttyl
NO SCHOOL TODAY.... YES!!

So I had this test this morning of which I did not study nearly enough for. I had the option of going to take it now and possible walking out with a D or worse or I could wait and take a make-up exam at the end of the semester. The make up would be an essay test. My specialty! I thought about it and I decided to take the make-up. I figured that if I was gonna go in today and screw it up then I would be stuck with that grade. If I take the make-up at least I have plenty of time to study and catch up on my reading. Therefore ensuring myself a better grade. If I catch up and then keep up with my reading I don't think that it will be a problem for me to at least pull a C on the make-up. Last time I checked a C would be better than a D! So that was my rational for blowing off my exam . I think it makes sense! Maybe. So, the rest of my day was great! Busy but wonderful. Tonight I get to work some more on my project for GD2 which is due tomorrow. I think I may have said it once before but in case you missed it: I DETEST PHOTOSHOP!!!! Off to do some homework! I hope all of you had a great day! Keep posting and know I think of you guys often! Monte, post you butt-muncher. I love ya!

Your wings are BROKEN and tattered. You are an angelic spirit who has fallen from grace for one reason or another - possibly, you made one tragic mistake that cost you everything. Or maybe you were blamed for a crime you didn't commit. In any case, you are faithless and joyless. You find no happiness, love, or acceptance in your love or in yourself. Most days are a burden and you wonder when the hurting will end. Sweet, beautiful and sorrowful, you paint a tragic and touching picture. You are the one that few understand. Those that do know you are likely to love you deeply and wish that they could do something to ease your pain. You are constantly living in memories of better times and a better world. You are hard on yourself and self-critical or self-loathing. Feeling rejected and unloved, you are sensitive, caring, deep, and despite your tainted nature, your soul is breathtakingly beautiful. urlLink *~*~*Claim Your Wings - Pics and Long Answers*~*~* brought to you by urlLink Quizilla I am not entirely sure that I agree with that result.... Ok this is the last quiz for the day! I promise. I couldn't help it though, I just thought the results were kinda cool. Mine really fits and it does sound like me. So check it out and let us know how you did! You are a PHOENIX in your soul and your wings make a statement. Huge and born of flame, they burn with light and power and rebirth. Ashes fall from your wingtips. You are an amazingly strong person. You survive, even flourish in adversity and hardship. A firm believer in the phrase, 'Whatever doesn't kill you only makes you stronger,' you rarely fear failure. You know that any mistake you make will teach you more about yourself and allow you to 'rise from the ashes' as a still greater being. Because of this, you rarely make the same mistake twice, and are not among the most forgiving people. You're extremely powerful and wise, and are capable of fierce pride, passion, and anger. Perhaps you're this way because you were forced to survive a rough childhood. Or maybe you just have a strong grasp on reality and know that life is tough and the world is cruel, and it takes strength and independence to survive it. And independence is your strongest point - you may care for others, and even depend on them...but when it comes right down to it, the only one you need is yourself. Thus you trust your own intuition, and rely on a mind almost as brilliant as the fire of your wings to guide you.You are eternal and because you have a strong sense of who and what you are, no one can control your heart or mind, or even really influence your thinking. A symbol of rebirth and renewal, you tend to be a very spiritual person with a serious mind - never acting immature and harboring a superior disgust of those who do. Likewise, humanity's stupidity and tendency to want others to solve their problems for them frustrates you endlessly. Though you can be stubborn, outspoken, and haughty, I admire you greatly. urlLink *~*~*Claim Your Wings - Pics and Long Answers*~*~* brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

Hey there everyone!!! I am glad to see you came to check things out. If you are here you already know what kinda things have been going on with me. Things have been kinda rough lately. To be honest I am pretty freaked out about the whole thing. Even the idea that I may have breast cancer makes me cry. Crying, I have been doing alot of that lately. Mostly because I have just been scared and some because even though I have my friends and family I feel kinda alone with this one. Everyone who knows about this has been so great! So THANK YOU!!! Today I went to the doctor again and she took a scraping of tissue from my breast and then I had an ultrasound done. She wanted me to have a mammogram done but because of my age they said it may be a problem. So they said I should have the ultrasound done first. The doctor in radiology said that there is a thickening of the tissue and that if the rash I have doesn't go away completely then I should be concerned. He said that it would lead him to suspect cancer. So now I just wait and see what the skin cells say. I should know something by the middle of next week. On to much lighter things. School is going good. I am still so glad I switched my major. I love doing this graphic design stuff. I am not to big on the drawing part but I love the computer aspect. If it was up to me I would just sit down and do it all on the computer but they say I still have to draw things out. So I gotta do what they say. Well, I guess I will go for now. I have tons to say but I have to save some for later. I hope you like this whole idea. Come back and read and write anytime you want! Laura

Well, it has been awhile since I have posted. Lots has happened but most of you know most of it already so I will be breif. My brother is getting married and he wants to have his wedding in the Carribean. Which is amazing but the expense it just as amazing. After talking to my mom about it we figure it is going to cost me about $1600.00. Which is alot, especially since I am on and income of only $9600.00 a year. I am still working out the kinks and so far it is not looking like it is going to work. I only hope that if I am unable to attend that he will be understanding. If that is the case then I will be going to spend a week with him sometime after he gets back. His wedding is going to be March of 2005 so I would be going to see him in May 2005. Well, I could use anyones advise as far as how ti handle this situation. He is planning this around my Spring break so that I would be able to go. I had already started planning a trip to the Bahamas with some of the girls here but we decided that if I go to my brothers wedding then we would go on that trip in January before coming back to school. So that part will work out no matter what. I am just concerned about hurting my brothers feelings and having him be angry with me. I don't want that to happen! Also, I got a phone call this morning from my dad and apparently my mom fell on her way out to the garage this morning and broke her ankle in two places. At this point she has already had surgery and is will be spending the night at least in the hospital. They had to put 7 screws and a metal plate on each side of her ankle. She is going to have a long recovery ahead of her. Not to mention that this is the same foot she just had surgery on 6 months ago. So she just finished healing fromthat and now she gets to do it all over again. Lucky her. At least I know where I got my clutziness from. My ankle is slowwwwwwwllllllyyyyy getting better. Can't walk without the brace or it will give out. Other than that things are ok here. Well I am sad to report that my Uncle has passed. We got the phone call around 8:30 on Sunday night. Things are kinda sad here right now. My parents will be leaving to go down on Wed. More later...

It is only 2 o'clock pm and today already sucks! My Uncle Jim, who has been very ill with cancer, is not doing well. He has gotten worse and they are saying it will be a few days at the most if not hours until he passes. I can't believe this. I know that most of you know how many deaths we have had in the past few years. I guess this is what happens when we get older. Since that is the case I want to be 10 again! Everyone here is really upset. Even though we knew it was coming (since they gave him six months on the out end about 1.5 months ago), it doesn't make it any easier. I spoke with my Aunt and she doesn't want me to come down. She and my Uncle had discussed it and they will not be having a formal funeral. She knows my parents will be there but she does not see any need for me to come. So I won't be going because I fell like I need to respect her wishes right now. Even though I feel like I should be there. I was unable to attend my Aunt Gayles funeral last year because it was during finals. She (Aunt Gayle) would have been pissed at me if I had gone and missed a test! I guess I am just babbling right now because I don't know how I am feeling or what to say. Anyway, I just need to vent a bit. I am gonna go for now. I am sure I will be back later...Thanks everyone.

this weekend was awesome..... our alumni rock the house. I met a lot of really cool guys that have came through here in the past and heard some amazing stories. I even met a Hersey alum from the early 90's. Friday night we had a meet and greet at this place in the square and then went over to the Pace. We had probably at least 20 guys there, and possibly as many as 30. It was awesome. Saturday we had a luncheon at the house, watched the NFL draft and the cubs game and hung out. that night we had a dinner and then went out to the bars, we started at the pace and ended up at two dogs. we had a good sized group there. I got dragged out onto the dance floor and ended up dancing with a bunch of different girls who were friends of the house and just had a good time. After the bar closed we went back to the house and sat around and shot the shit for awhile. I ended up crawling into bed at about 6:30. there is even more to it than that but I could talk about the weekend for pages. ask me in person if you want more details to sum it all up: This was my best weekend as a DU and I am more proud now than ever of the letters.

So they are no longer friends and I don't have to deal with her anymore. AND I dont' have to be nice either and I don't plan to. So hopefully she willjust leave me alone cuz I will not be restraining myself any longer. That is all I have right now. Sorry it is not so positive but that will change in a few weeks.

"I didn't know how many of them it would take to whip my ass, but I knew how many they were gonna use." So, yesterday was far more interersting than I ever thought it would be. I went to a final four party at my friends house. My friend Frank and I probably had about 9 beers there and then went to a local establishment known as the Change of Pace. Four SoCo's and Coke later and I'm talking to some girl named Jackie, talking about baseball and having a good time. Well, we decided to leave after awhile, cause we were all pretty tattered and broke. So we are walking out, and we were walking the girls to their car. These two guys walk over towards us, and were giving the girls a hard time. My friend and I stepped and asked them to leave. We told them there was no reason for anything to happen and that they should walk away. Well, this one guy decided I looked like I needed to get my ass kicked, so he started pushing me. At this point Frank stepped in the middle because me and this guy were exchanging words. I had been saying to this guy "Who the fuck do you think you are? Why do you think you need to fight? It's been a good night. No reason for anything to happen, just walk away." Well, I started walking off with thr\e girls and these guys are shouting profanities at me, basically calling me a pussy for not fighting and all sorts of shit like that. Well, while frank was talking to them (there were 3) one of them went around frank and caught up to me and the girls and started pushing me again and calling me a pussy. What these guys didn't know was that frank had given me his phone, he had called the house and the girls had called the cops. We couldn't get a hold of the house, but the cops showed up really damn quick and split the thing up. The two guys out of the 3 that had been looking for a fight ran and their buddy was left their to explain stuff to the cops. The girls were impressed with the way me and frank had handled (the fact that we didn't throw any punches) the one girl was sober enough to drive so she gave us a ride home. The moral of the story is to expect the unexpected. I had no desire to go the bars, and in the end I ended up meeting a really cool girl and I almost got into a fight....anyways I'm gonna watch some LOTR hugs and handpounds.....

Tonight was our easter party complete with a drunk in an easter bunny costume handing out jello shots in plastic easter eggs. The bunny was awesome. all the girls were getting their picture taken with the bunny and dancing with him and shit. it was pretty sweet. one of our advisors came over, and was pissed off about the jello shots. O well. we will just have to deal with the consequences. anyways, I will show pics as soon as I can track some down.

Hello, all! Laura, I am so sorry for your loss. Just so many family members dying, lately. Are you okay? Let me know if you need anything. Death sucks, it is always difficult. I will call you tomorrow. Love ya!

I think I am gonna just give up on the idea that things are gonna get better. Yup this is just gonna be another shit-hole year. My mom is doing crappy. They still don't have her pain under control. They are working on it but it seems to be taking along time. I saw her x-rays and her ankle is screwed. Her other ankle is sprained and huge as well. She may be coming home tomorrow so we can get her settled. It is going to be a very long recovery. To top things off I got to the hospital and my dad made me sit in a chair and told me that my Grandma died. They waited to tell me until I got here cuz they didn't want to tell me and then have me drive all the way home. I don't get this. Everyone keeps dying and I just can't seem to figure out Gods stupid plan. I mean what the fuck. Why now? I have all this crap running through my head right now. I can't keep my thoughts straight. I am trying to be strong for my dad. My mom can't take care of things right now so he only has us to lean on. My dad is a "toughie" but he can only take so much. I just don't know what to say because I can't even figure shit out for myself! I just don't get it anymore. Oh to hell with it all... Thanks for listening to me vent. This really as sent me for a spin. I am not dealling very well with this at all. I just can't stop crying. I am ok one minute and the next I am a mess. We can't get a hold of my brother either. We have been calling all day and night and he is still not in and is not anwsering our messeges. Anyway, I am out for now...

So, I was reading the blog that I started that consists of my friends from highschool. It turns out Susan is back from Costa Rica. For those of you keeping score at home, Susan is the girl I was talking about in my rant the other day. In the time that she was in Costa Rica, I realized even more so that I really enjoy spending time with her and that I really do like her. I also decided that it's best not to do anything with that as of now. Actually I don't see myself doing anything with that anytime in the near future, because I am convinced that it would end badly for me, and I really don't wanna deal with that. This summer will be for rest and relaxation and earning money to keep me drinking. I will worry about that other stuff some other time.

Well, I just want you to know that I will still be posting even if it is kinda messed up posts. Those of you whom have had the pleasure of experiencing an evening with me while I am on my medication know what I can be like. Those of you who have not, well all I can say is you are in for some strange posts and thoughts and I am sorry in advance!!! So anyway, I have not yet taken my meds for the night but I am off to do so and hopefully I will just go to bed this time like I should. See, ideally I take them and they knock me out and I sleep through the night. Although, every once in awhile that is not the case. They don't put me to sleep, instead they make me loopy. Mike I know how you feel and I am sorry. But you do have to believe in order to get through because you are the only one who can get you through. We as friends can support and love you (as we do) but you have to make the ultimate decision yourself. We can give advice but it is up to you. I have faith in you. I know you are strong inside otherwise you wouldn't have gotten here. Maybe you are meant to be single or maybe you have spent so much time convincing yourselfef of that so it has become a part of you. I can relate to that as well. Chops you are never alone. Fear does rule us all in one sense or another. The fear of being alone. The fear of being rejected. The fear of losing everything we have worked so hard for. The fear of going outside. The fear of letting people in. The fear of being yourself. The fear of what others think. The fear of being loved. The fear of not being loved. Through all of this you are not alone. Remember that, please! I believe it may not be not your time yet. I believe in fate, karma. Maybe you are so precious that you are being held on the side for the one who really needs YOU. Maybe you need to be found by someone who needs to be loved unconditionally. Maybe you are the one who will save them from years of heartache, loneliness,and disappointment. Maybe you are their ticket to joy, love and happiness. I guess sometime you have to try to look at it from a different side. This is what I see and I hope you can see it as well. I hope this makes you feel better. I love you Chops.

Hey! Laura, you are such a goof(green bean butts)!!! Mike, I really enjoyed reading your last post. It was very real and I can relate to some of the feelings. You must really care for Susan. I agree that one decision or event can change your whole world. I think that is why I have a hard time making certain decisions. Also, I do agree that some sort of fear rules each one of us. I always felt that it was just me, but over time I have really seen that everyone has their own fear. I wish I was better at believing in myself. I tend to let others determine how I feel about myself and I hate that more than anything. I am trying to work on that. Who knows if it will work?

I warned Laura that I may do this one of these days, so I will now start a rambling. Hopefully it makes sense. (BTW when I do these things I enjoy writing in the 2nd person and sometimes I don't do it well, especially when I dont proofread as I did with this.) It is amazing how the smallest event can change everything. The smallest decisions have made a huge impact on your life. Like when you decided to join orchestra. You were fortunate enough to meet her. Susan. You know what you want to say. What you need to say. The question is: Will you be able to say it? Regardless of what we'd like to believe, fear rules us all. You are afraid of what she will say. Afraid that you will lose something that has become very important to you. You just have to decide if the risk is worth the reward. Everything happens for a reason. Everything. Perhaps there is a reason why you have been single for all this time. Perhaps it is so that when you find that someone you will enjoy it that much more. That's what you would like to believe, but we know the truth. Deep down inside you believe that the reason you have been single is because you are meant to be single. Not everyone finds someone and you know that. Of course your fear is different. Now, now only are you afraid that the girl would show no interest, but you are also afraid that she would show interest cause you believe that you have no idea what to do. Believe. You toss that word around a lot. Ever since the Cubs became a team worthy of national attention. JUST BELIEVE...like a mantra. You believe in the Cubs. You believe in your friends, and your family. Hell you even believe in yourself from time to time. As long as it is school or athletics. So why don't you believe in yourself when it comes to that other stuff? The fact of the matter is after years of hearing how great of a guy you are, it just doesn't mean as much, especially when those years have been spent with nothing but dissapointment.... All you can do is believe. Believe in yourself as you do others and remain hopeful, because without hope what do you have?

This is a bit late but since I actually had someone mail me this disgusting video clip I felt it was time I commented on it. I tried to be syphathetic to those who feel that the United States is the enemy and I have tried to look at it from both points even though I have also supported most of this war in Iraq and on terror. But my understanding has drawn a line. I don't feel compassion nor sorrow anymore. Simply anger and disgust. I felt it before I saw the video and I feel it even more now. To think that we are trying to give these friggin people a chance at a life with freedom and the will to choose and some of them just can't get there heads out of the god damn asses for one fucking second. It really pisses me off. At this point, maybe we should just turn the damn country into a wasteland. Put them out of their misery!!! They don't support what has been done instead they hide behind their masks because they can't feel pride to show themselves when they commit these acts. Makes sense to not feel pride about cutting some inocent mans head off. Anyones for that matter. I know in the back of my head that there are people in that counry who want us there and want and welcome our help but they need to take a stand as well. If they can't by now then maybe we shouldn't bother either. These people are fucked up. It is like a cold blooded killer, you can only do so much to rehabilitate them. We accept that they are screwed and leave their sorry asses in jail. But since we obviously cannot jail all of Iraq maybe we should just wipe em out. I know I don't really want to wipe em all out cuz there has to be good in order to bad there but I am so sick of this shit. As far as using restraint in Iraq, to hell with that. I also do not agree with what happened to those prisioners either.I am so disgusted right now. My brother is leaving for the gulf on June 7th and I am scared and Iam angry. I have grown cold to the situation and if someone came to me now and told me that the fate of Iraq is in my hands I would have to say drop the bomb. end all of it. Nothing wrong with a fresh start. I know not all of you feel this way and that is ok, I can respect that. I am just very angry right now so I am venting. Kinda talking out loud. My thoughts are coming faster than I can type so I don't even know what is all here. i am gonna stop now though before I alienate all of you. I hope you understand that this is mostly based on anger and fear.

I was sitting around and was pretty bored but felt like going out. Summerfest in Milwaukee started today (Thursday) so I looked to see who was gonna be there tonight. Seether was playing so I called Sarah and asked her if she wanted to go. So we go and the place was packed. Summerfest is like Taste of Chicago but instead of lots of good food there is lots of great bands! We paid 12 to get into the park (pretty cheap). Saw a few other bands who pretty much kicked butt too. Then it came time for Seether to play. For those of you who are unsure of who Seether is, they sing a song called "Broken" with the lead vocalist from Evanescence Amy Lee. It is played alot on the radio. Anyway, they rocked the stage. They played for an hour and a half and left the stage. They played stuff we have heard on the radio, off their current album and stuff that is off their upcoming album. I knew they were gonna come back cuz they hadn't sung Broken (which also for those of you who don't know was originally released by just Seether singing the whole song). So no one leaves, and I mean no one. They finally come back out after relentless chanting from the crowd. They sing a song and then say "Ok now this is the last song of the night. It is a song we call Broken" Then they start to rock. They get through the first verse and, no shit, AMY LEE from EVANESCENCE comes out!!!!! I almost fell over. I looked at Sarah and was like "OMG, there she is, it's Amy Lee!!!" They kicked ass!!!! I couldn't believe it. I was stunned but rocking away! Damn, and to think I was gonna stay in tonight! I can't wait until Wed. when we go see Nickelback and Three Doors Down.!!! We are talking about going to see Shinedown on July 3. We are sure you we are gonna go see Three Days Grace on July 4th. This next week or so is gonna kick ass!!!!!!!!

Well, I went and hung out with Jaime tonight. He is going through something and we talked about it a bit but I don't really know whets' up. Then again, neither does he. It was so good to see him though. I forgot how much I missed him. Things had felt so tense between us lately for various different reasons but tonight it was clear that things are fine. It was just very reassuring to have us both reassuring each other about each other, if that made any sense. I have not been feeling well myself. I don't know what is up with me. Tonight I almost didn't make it out of my house, I had to force myself to go. I have been feeling like I did when I first came home 4 years ago. I don't want to leave my house unless I have to. I don't feel safe. I know I have everyone around me but I have been feeling very vulnerable and a bit alone. I am sure it is just a phase. It will pass. I am kinda nervous about it though. I know my cycle of depression and it is about time for it to start creeping up. It seems to be about every 5 years of so I get really depressed. The problem in the past was that I didn't know it. Since I know it now, I am trying to prevent it. I don't know how well I am doing but I am trying. I have been trying to convince myself that everything is fine and that I am fine but, I have not been doing too good a job with it. I will fine eventually though be just not today. So, sorry to dump all this in here. Chops, it sure sounds like you are having a great time at the camp! I bet you are great with the kids. I know how you are and I am sure you are making things so much fun for them. Glad your summer is really shaping up! Sarah, I cannot wait until next Wednesday!!!!!! I am so excited! The concert is gonna kick ass! I am looking forward to it and I just can tell you how much I am. BTW, Thanks for listening to me lately. I know you have alot of your own stuff going on. I know you will always be there for me as I will for you but I just wanted to say thanks anyway. Well I am out.
camp has been fun. I met some of the parents tonight cause they had a parent night thing. That was interesting.... all for now. bye

I know all of this was because I had taken to much of my medication and still couldn't sleep so I stayed up. So instead of sitting here wailing about how no one loves me , yadda, yadda, yadda, (which I know is not true) I cracked out my art supplies and made this amazing piece. I finally finished it around 5:00 am this morning. Now I have to go and get some fixative at the art store. All I have is the workable kind and I need to get the kind that freezes it so to speak. I think I need to give my friends some room to breath right now. I have been on the phone with Sarah once sometimes twice a day maybe even three times. When I came home I felt like I needed to make up for not being here when all the things happened with Jim. So I think it was kinda ok then. Now I think she is getting stronger (and I am so proud of her) and I know she still needs me just not so...in her face. I feel like I am smoothing her and maybe we need space so we don't grow apart from being so close. If that makes any sense. Jaime I don't know if he is just being an asshole or how I should perceive his actions. When he was going through this whole thing with Melissa (I am referring to when she was saying she was pregnant and she really wasn't and when she was threatening both of us) he need me to be there for him all the time. I was the only one who knew what was going on, the only one he trusted with the truth. Ever since we found out that she was really lying he has been distant and frankly cranky with me. I have not seen him since then. I didn't call him for a few days last week and it was like he panicked so he had to call and find out what I was doing and where I had been, like alot in detail. It was just a weird conversation. Then it was back to the crabby Jaime. I don't know if he thinks I will put up with this or what. I don't know if I am supposed to as a friend. I just don't think it is right for him to be like this with me. I was supposed to go over there last night to watch WWE with him. He was gonna call me on his way home from work. He totally blew me off. So maybe he needs space too. I don't think I am gonna call anyone for a few days unless something happens. Everyone knows my number. I just wanna give them the space that I think they might need cuz I love them so much. I will still be posting on here so I will check and see how everyone is. Chops, I am sorry to hear about your cell phone mishaps. That kinda sucks. I hope they get it straightend out soon. By the way, when do you start that camp thing? And if you started it already how is it going? I know you will be in the DU house in the fall but I wish you were still on Tanner 13. Just thought I would let you know that. BTW in case I forgot to mention...Sarah and I saw Vin in Riddick!!!! Good flick not to mention HOT!! Yum, yum! I am out for now...

Hello, all! Mike, I know what you mean. My father grew up in the city and is a die hard Cubs fan. I think it is an obsession. He is 65 years old and has been waiting all his life for the Cubs to win the World Series. He raised me and my 5 siblings to be Cubs fans. But with 6 kids you will get at least one who wants to be difficult. I have one brother who likes to argue with my dad that he prefers the Sox. It is more of just a fun little battle between the two of them. I am not a huge baseball junkie, but I was taught well and always support the Cubs.

As I watched the Cubs lose their second straight to the Cardinals today and their 3rd in a row overall a thought crossed my mind...Why in god's name is my father still a Cubs fan? He is 47 years old, and in his life time the Cubs have never been to the World Series. Come to think of it, sweet home Chicago hasn't been to a world series since he was a wee lad at the age of 3. Anyways, I looked at the Cubs history. Since my father was born, they have finished an average of 19.5 games out of first place and have only finished above .500 13 times, with quite a few of those being those Cubs teams of the late '60's and early '70's. It does explain why he doesn't get as crazy as me and Timmy. He doesn't hit the high's or lows, but maintains a happy medium. All these years of cheering for the Cubs has left the man emotionally dead. Furthermore, he has raised me and Timmy as Cubs fans and has assured us a similiar life unless someday they finally win the damn thing. Anyways....Cubs are 10 games out of 1st in the NL Central and 3 back in the wild card race if San Francisco wins tonight.....if you are religious now would be a good time to start praying, otherwise it may be Wait Till Next Year really soon.

I suppose I should probably finally say what I thought of the Director's Cut. It was certainly a different way of ending the movie. I liked the director's cut. I really enjoyed the scenes that they put into the movie and I felt the ending was well done. The big thing with the ending is that it fits the tone of the movie better. The movie is very depressing, and the original ending seemed too perfect. I also like the way that the new ending suggests that those two other stillborn babies were perhaps others who came to the same conclusion as evan. as i said, a very sad ending, but neccesary.
Hi!

Chops, I did finally see the extended directors cut of the movie and I thought the extra stuff in the movie was cool but I thought the new ending sucked! I preferred the original theatrical version better. If it had been up to me I would have taken all the extra stuff that was added into the movie for the directors cut, except the baby in the womb thing, left the ending the way it was and made that the movie. BUT...that is just my opinion. I got to hang out with Sarah and Monte last night and that was nice. It was good to see him since I hadn't seen him since he left for Oklahoma. He brought us back these amazing postcards from there. I love em, but then again I have this thing with collecting postcards. Either way, it was really good to see him since I missed him while he was gone. It was weird to go from talking to him everyday to barely talking to him while he was away so I am glad he is back. So things here are good. I am doing good. Life is good. No real dire complaints. The world is not coming to an end or anything. I am looking forward to August since there will be tons going on. I am hoping that the first weekend in August - Sarah, Monte, and I can go out for his birthday. I think it will be nice and fun since he doesn't really do much of that kinda stuff. Then the next weekend Rachana and I are going to Sheila's wedding in Jacksonville (yup all the way down by WIU). We will get back from that on Sunday the 15th and I will leave on Thursday the 19th for WIU move in crew. Then on the 23 it back to the grind with classes.

July 3rd Here's my story: I had gone down to Wrigley with a group of people to see the Cubs - Sox game. We got down there at about 9 for a 12:20 start and got in line to get standing room only. By the time that we got there, the line was pretty long but we remained optimistic. After a half-hour we finally got to the front of the line. I happily slapped my money down on the counter to get my ticket. At this point the lady checked her computer and said, "We are sold out." I was absolutely shocked. They had like 6 lines going to get tickets, and some of my friends who had been sent to other lines shortly before me got tickets. The way it worked out was: 3 people got tickets and 2 didn't. Part of the problem was that they sold fewer standing room only tickets. Anyways, the most frustrating part of all off this is that while we were waiting in line, a guy offered us 4 bleacher seats at face value. We had a group of 5. IF we had only had 4 people we would have been able to purchase those tickets and enjoy our first game from the bleachers. After my brother and his two friends got tickets, my friend and I walked around the neighborhood trying to get something to work but were unable to. (Tickets were going for anywhere from 50 - 400 dollars a piece) After awhile, my brother and his friends went into Wrigley and me and my friend sat out on Waveland hoping to catch a homerun ball. Well, in the bottom of the first a Moises Alou HR ball went out onto Waveland and this guy about 15 feet away from us caught it on a fly. Had there been a bounce I may have had a chance. Now, sitting out on Waveland you meet some interesting people....There was this one guy running around with a homemade shirt that said GO CUBS on the front and SOX SUCK on the back. He was missing a few teeth and the ones that he did have were crooked. We also met these two brothers from Oak Lawn, they were kinda cool, but I gave the one guy my number, cause he wanted to be able to meet up at another cubs game this summer, and he called me like 5 times last night. Because of the rain delays we ran down to the fire station and hung out with the fire department guys for a little bit. Some really good people down there. I was very thankful for the hospitality during those rain delays. The strangest part of the day came in about the second inning. Now there was a family by us. You had the dad, the mom, and the daughter. The daughter was pretty cute. She was wearing this little Cubs jersey and was looking pretty good. She also had a happy birthday sign for Moises Alou (apparently she had met him) Well, this guy walks past from the bar. He says he has just won 2 tickets to the game and wants someone to go with him and will give the ticket for free. Now keep in mind that the girl is about 18 (she had told me that she was gonna be a freshman at Indiana-Bloomington) and this guy was probably in his late 20's. This girl is jumping all over the place with the biggest grin on her face. Well, the parents let her go in.... I ask you this: If you were those parents would you have made that decision? Seemed rather odd to me. Anyways...that was my day. I woke up early and waited for tickets. Didn't get tickets. Got soaked in the rain. Met good people. Most importantly though, the Cubs won GO CUBS!!!!

I deleted the solar system thingy cuz i was messing up all the posts after it. I have never had anything mess it up like that but no biggie. I did like it though. Sorry, hope I am forgiven!!! So, I finally start dating again and I have come to the conclusion that the first one is a dud! I should be happy though because he "showed me his real cards" early in the game. Although he hide things in what he says thinking that I must be stupid and won't pick up on them or something. DUH, NOT!!! Here's an example: We were talking about things that may have seemed a bit off between us and if we felt they were things we could work on. He says to me that my hair isn't long enough, but I can grow it. That he really likes me and feels safe a good with me. That he really feels this is gonna work out. Then tells me that he knows I am already working on my weight so that will be changing. Then says that once that is all done things should be good. Good, WTF. So let me get this straight the way I am now is "ok" but not really what he wants. The way I will be once I am done losing the weight and grow my hair long will be perferct because that is what he is looking for. No offense but I know what I am gonna look like and it will be what alot of guys will be looking for. Jackass. He also takes the time to make a few insulting comments to me about my friends (which lets me know that he may not really like them). He was not all that pleased with my response concerning that. HE doesn't feel he needs to improve on his life. He is renting a house with 2 other guys and is hoping his dad may help him out to buy it. HE IS 36 for crying out loud. When I ask him if he wants to go back to school he says no, that he doesn't like school and therefore doesn't see the need for it, especially since he has a good job now. I suppose it maybe a good job, it probably is. However, it is not enough to pay the bills or much less support him on his own. He tells me that it is not important to support himself because when he finds someone there will be 2 incomes. Yeah, I suppose but one of them will not be mine. See, at first I thought all of these things were bothering me because I was scared to be in a relationship, to get back out there and date again. It had been so long for me. Now that I have talked to my friends about it, it is clear that these things should bother me. I don't want to end up in a shithole relationship again. Not to mention that I don't ever want to date someone who doesn't want me hanging out with or at my friends. I am not gonna drop my friends for any guy again and while Chris didn't ask me to do this he made it clear that my time should be with him and not them. So in the words of my friend Shane, "I think it is time to toss this fish back!" So that has been my saga as of late. Still not sure how to do this or why I feel bad about it. I suppose that will pass in time. SARAH , I want to make sure I keep telling you how proud I am of you! You are gonna go back to college! You are doing something for yourself not for anyone else so make sure to enjoy it. It will be work but I know you are strong and you will succeed. You deserve this chance and I know you will excel!!!!! CONGRATULATIONS you fellow college goer. CHOPS, Just think only 2 weeks left. I sometimes feel like it couldn't come soon enough! I am really looking forward to getting back to WIU. I know we keep missing each other on here but I want you to know you are in my thoughts on a regular basis and I miss you tons! I can't wait for us to get to hang out and catch up!!!! Well thats all for now. TTYL
